tags: this was way funnier in my head
summary: What if, instead of the soul world, Bucky would end up in the body of Jon Snow’s direwolf Ghost (because, you know, The White...
body:
What if, instead of the soul world, Bucky would end up in the body of Jon Snow’s direwolf Ghost (because, you know, The White Wolf?). It would go something like this:

Ghost-Bucky: Steve?!
Jon Snow: WTF? You can talk?!
Ghost-Bucky: You’re not Steve.
Jon Snow: Well, obviously.
Ghost-Bucky: Who the hell are you? 
Jon Snow: I am Jon Snow. Now, who the hell are YOU, and what are you doing in my wolf’s body?
Ghost-Bucky: Wait, i am actually a wolf now:? *Looks down at the paws* Huh, this is pretty cool.
Jon Snow: Look, i have no idea what is going on here, so would you please get out of my wolf?! Wait, that didn’t sound right.
Ghost-Bucky: I will as soon i’ll find Steve.
Jon Snow: Sorry buddy, but no-one in this realm is named Steve.
Ghost-Bucky: So you can be callded Jon, but not Steve? Sure, Jan…I mean Jon.

summary: Scientists Hope To Drop “Dragon Eggs” Onto Volcanoes
title: Scientists Hope To Drop “Dragon Eggs” Onto Volcanoes
body:
Here’s one way to get my attention: talking about dropping things called “dragon eggs” into volcanoes where they “hatch”. Fine, University of Bristol: you win.

Obviously, these are not real dragon eggs, because (spoiler alert) dragons aren’t real. They’re actually more like silvery boxes placed on the slopes or near the vent of a volcano, which makes them more like dragon presents, I suppose. Either way, they promise to change how we think about volcano monitoring.

Volcanoes are ideally covered in monitoring equipment, including instruments that measure changes in ground deformation, thermal and gaseous emissions, and seismic activity. However, positioning the equipment, particularly in volcanic systems that regularly or unpredictably engage in eruptive activity, is easier said than done. Sometimes, it’s downright dangerous.

Although many of the most hazardous are monitored, including in the US, plenty of this equipment isn’t cutting-edge – and plenty of volcanoes remain poorly monitored or entirely unmonitored. This is where the eggs come in.

These small, lightweight boxes, dropped off by drones, are designed to sit atop volcanoes. They contain thermometers, accelerometers, humidity sensors, and volatile gas analyzers. The idea is that whenever the volcano begins to rumble, they activate or “hatch”, record data and transmit data, and withstand the corrosive and scorching environment around them.

These devices are, rather conveniently, autonomous, meaning they work all by themselves, no pesky humans required. Although details are currently scant, a University of Bristol press release suggests that they’re activated by small movements, with the sensors triggered by energy levels equivalent to 100,000 times less than those involved when a fruit fly bounces off your nose.

This sounds like witchcraft, but these low-energy, battery-lacking sensors are indeed real. Whether they’re siphoning energy from radio transmissions or from minuscule vibrations, many see them as the future of so-called smart sensors.

Dr Kieran Wood, an aerospace engineer who’s heavily involved in the project, told IFLScience that this tech means they can lay “dormant for years” before being awoken through a variety of inputs. Asked about the decidedly un-egg-like shape of the devices, Wood cheekily notes that “this is a technology project, so I guess that is what robot-dragon eggs look like.”

So far, they’ve been tested on Italy’s Stromboli volcano, a highly predictable, not particularly dangerous lava-fountaining hill that’s often used to test models, new tech, and theories. “The current design of the eggs ‘wake’ when they sense vibrations, hence Stromboli is perfect because of the regular ground tremors provided by the eruptions,” Wood says.

At this stage, this collaborative effort between an interdisciplinary team of scientists and a tech start-up company, Sensor Driven Ltd, is a proof-of-concept idea. The eggs need testing on far more volcanoes to demonstrate their viability.

Fortunately, that’s precisely what’s happening next. “We are aiming to deploy more eggs at Rabaul volcano in Papua New Guinea later this year,” Wood explains, pointing out that its large eruption potential, proximity to a city and its dangerous near-vent conditions make it an ideal target.

The eggs cannot be said, as some outlets have bizarrely claimed, to be able to predict when volcanoes will erupt. They activate when they detect a range of volcanic activities, meaning they could perhaps signal an impending eruption to some degree.

No one can specifically predict when a volcanic eruption will occur. Each volcano is entirely idiosyncratic, meaning that it has its own eruption histories, styles, and warning signs – or lack thereof. When things begin rumbling, it’s possible to suggest it will erupt within a certain timeframe, but this isn’t the bang-on prediction that people imagine.

What these dragon eggs can potentially achieve is the remote, autonomous monitoring of volcanoes that normally endanger volcanologists’ lives. It’s not clear how high-resolution the data is compared to conventional instruments, but either way, the huge advantage of their far-flung transportation ability is clear.

Noting that the project is also funded by a grant from the National Centre for Nuclear Robotics, Wood adds that future plans also include using the eggs to monitor changes in ambient radiation levels around nuclear power plants and storage sites.

This project, once again, also showcases the increasing presence of drones in volcanology. Already used to take geochemistry samples and thermal readings, produce 3D topographic models of volcanic craters, and even redirect people away from lava flows they’re simultaneously documenting, they’re accomplishing feats that were previously neither possible nor safe.

These dragon eggs are, quite inarguably, cool bits of tech. It’s the drones, however, that remain the current stars of the show – so expect to see more creative uses for them in the coming months and years.

Read more: https://www.iflscience.com/technology/scientists-hope-drop-dragon-eggs-onto-volcanoes/

The post Scientists Hope To Drop “Dragon Eggs” Onto Volcanoes appeared first on Viral TV News.



from WordPress http://www.viraltvnews.com/game_of_thrones/scientists-hope-to-drop-dragon-eggs-onto-volcanoes/

Evil Regal, Hoodie, Outlaw Queen, Dimples Queen, Outlaw Dimples/Peanut & Curious Archer fan. Oh I write subpar OQ & OUAT next gen fanfic too.

LariskaPargitay on twitter, Bellatrix Wannabe 89 on FF Bellatrix_Wannabe_89 on AO3

summary: I’m stil obsessed with the idea of Brienne being the one in Cersei’s prophecy to destroy her. That Maggie meant beauty on the...
body:
I’m stil obsessed with the idea of Brienne being the one in Cersei’s prophecy to destroy her. That Maggie meant beauty on the inside instead of the obvious choices of Marjorie or Daenerys. I really hope that’s the direction they go.

The only thing I’m not keen on is the only reason why I can see Brienne killing Cersei is Bc Cersei killed Jaime (which I fully think is gonna happen)

we look up at the same stars and see such different things

felix. xxv. he/they. wales.

summary: another renly headcanon as a baby he loved the beach and the sea. his mother used to carry him down to the beach whenever she...
body:
another renly headcanon

  • as a baby he loved the beach and the sea. his mother used to carry him down to the beach whenever she went for walks on the strand, chatting to the fishermen and their wives as the boats came in and the day’s catch was unloaded. she’d hold his hands whilst he paddled in the surf and would show him around all the rock pools and stuff, oohing and aahing over the interesting shells and pebbles with holes in and fossils that he would pick up to show her. ‘mama! mama!’ was one of the most often-heard things on shipbreaker bay when renly was a baby because he was so enamoured with everything and wanted to show her it all.
  • renly was watching with robert and stannis from the window when their parents’ ship was wrecked in the bay, but was still tiny (two or three) so didn’t really understand that mama and papa were on that ship until they didn’t come home, at which point robert (through tears) explained to him that the storm killed them, the sea killed them. and from then on, renly is petrified of water.
  • from the time his parents died to around the age of thirteen renly refuses to even take a bath unless there’s someone in the room with him. that phase only endswhen he’s told he’ll be getting a squire, at which point he forces himself to get over it because how is his squire going to respect a lord who’s too afraid to bathe alone. even at fifteen when loras first arrives he still wakes up most nights in a cold sweat and entangled in his blankets, stifling a scream, because he’s dreamed he was drowning again.
  • all the same he won’t go near the bay and refuses to set so much as a toe in the sea. he doesn’t learn to swim until he’s seventeen and loras teaches him. loras, who swims like he was born underwater, goes cliffdiving and jumps into the water; it takes a couple of seconds for him to pop back up, and in those seconds renly is freaking out. like, full-blown panic attack, hysterics, can’t-breathe-feels-like-he’s-dying panic. he goes splashing into the water to rescue him and he’s struggling and floundering and loras pops up and is nonplussed because i’m absolutely fine, renly, and then notices that renly himself is decidedly not fine because he’s swallowing half the sea and flailing. he’s astounded that the lord of storm’s end can’t swim - it’s like hearing of a seasick ironborn, or a dothraki afraid of horses - and makes it his personal mission to teach renly to at least tread water.
  • it takes months of daily practise, loras insisting renly come down to the bay with him after his training in the yard to bathe and wash off the sweat and grime of the day. on days when the sea is too rough for swimming, they go to the old godswood and swim in the pool there. at first he can’t coax renly in any further than knee-deep, but eventually when renly sees that loras has yet to drown horribly he starts getting incrementally braver. it’s still ages before he’ll come in past his chest, and he resolutely refuses to put his head under, but loras manages to get him doing a clumsy breaststroke and the day renly manages to swim across the bay doing that (and floats for a couple of seconds on his back) he looks so proud of himself that loras spends several minutes just covering his face with adoring kisses until renly’s so pink he looks like he’s been sunburnt.

reblog.comment:
another renly headcanon

  • as a baby he loved the beach and the sea. his mother used to carry him down to the beach whenever she went for walks on the strand, chatting to the fishermen and their wives as the boats came in and the day’s catch was unloaded. she’d hold his hands whilst he paddled in the surf and would show him around all the rock pools and stuff, oohing and aahing over the interesting shells and pebbles with holes in and fossils that he would pick up to show her. ‘mama! mama!’ was one of the most often-heard things on shipbreaker bay when renly was a baby because he was so enamoured with everything and wanted to show her it all.
  • renly was watching with robert and stannis from the window when their parents’ ship was wrecked in the bay, but was still tiny (two or three) so didn’t really understand that mama and papa were on that ship until they didn’t come home, at which point robert (through tears) explained to him that the storm killed them, the sea killed them. and from then on, renly is petrified of water.
  • from the time his parents died to around the age of thirteen renly refuses to even take a bath unless there’s someone in the room with him. that phase only endswhen he’s told he’ll be getting a squire, at which point he forces himself to get over it because how is his squire going to respect a lord who’s too afraid to bathe alone. even at fifteen when loras first arrives he still wakes up most nights in a cold sweat and entangled in his blankets, stifling a scream, because he’s dreamed he was drowning again.
  • all the same he won’t go near the bay and refuses to set so much as a toe in the sea. he doesn’t learn to swim until he’s seventeen and loras teaches him. loras, who swims like he was born underwater, goes cliffdiving and jumps into the water; it takes a couple of seconds for him to pop back up, and in those seconds renly is freaking out. like, full-blown panic attack, hysterics, can’t-breathe-feels-like-he’s-dying panic. he goes splashing into the water to rescue him and he’s struggling and floundering and loras pops up and is nonplussed because i’m absolutely fine, renly, and then notices that renly himself is decidedly not fine because he’s swallowing half the sea and flailing. he’s astounded that the lord of storm’s end can’t swim - it’s like hearing of a seasick ironborn, or a dothraki afraid of horses - and makes it his personal mission to teach renly to at least tread water.
  • it takes months of daily practise, loras insisting renly come down to the bay with him after his training in the yard to bathe and wash off the sweat and grime of the day. on days when the sea is too rough for swimming, they go to the old godswood and swim in the pool there. at first he can’t coax renly in any further than knee-deep, but eventually when renly sees that loras has yet to drown horribly he starts getting incrementally braver. it’s still ages before he’ll come in past his chest, and he resolutely refuses to put his head under, but loras manages to get him doing a clumsy breaststroke and the day renly manages to swim across the bay doing that (and floats for a couple of seconds on his back) he looks so proud of himself that loras spends several minutes just covering his face with adoring kisses until renly’s so pink he looks like he’s been sunburnt.

trail.content_raw:
another renly headcanon

  • as a baby he loved the beach and the sea. his mother used to carry him down to the beach whenever she went for walks on the strand, chatting to the fishermen and their wives as the boats came in and the day’s catch was unloaded. she’d hold his hands whilst he paddled in the surf and would show him around all the rock pools and stuff, oohing and aahing over the interesting shells and pebbles with holes in and fossils that he would pick up to show her. ‘mama! mama!’ was one of the most often-heard things on shipbreaker bay when renly was a baby because he was so enamoured with everything and wanted to show her it all.

  • all the same he won’t go near the bay and refuses to set so much as a toe in the sea. he doesn’t learn to swim until he’s seventeen and loras teaches him. loras, who swims like he was born underwater, goes cliffdiving and jumps into the water; it takes a couple of seconds for him to pop back up, and in those seconds renly is freaking out. like, full-blown panic attack, hysterics, can’t-breathe-feels-like-he’s-dying panic. he goes splashing into the water to rescue him and he’s struggling and floundering and loras pops up and is nonplussed because i’m absolutely fine, renly, and then notices that renly himself is decidedly not fine because he’s swallowing half the sea and flailing. he’s astounded that the lord of storm’s end can’t swim - it’s like hearing of a seasick ironborn, or a dothraki afraid of horses - and makes it his personal mission to teach renly to at least tread water.

summary:
বাজারে আসতে চলেছে “গেম অফ থ্রোনস” দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত হোয়াইট ওয়াকার হুইস্কি

বিখ্যাত টেলিভিশন সিরিজ "গেম অফ থ্রোনস" দ্বারা...
caption:
বাজারে আসতে চলেছে “গেম অফ থ্রোনস” দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত হোয়াইট ওয়াকার হুইস্কি

বিখ্যাত টেলিভিশন সিরিজ “গেম অফ থ্রোনস” দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত হুইস্কি হোয়াইট ওয়াকার আপনার মাদকতায় কনিষ্ঠতম সংযোজন।  এইচবিও এবং “গেমস অফ থ্রোনস”-এর সহযোগিতায় আত্বপ্রকাশ ঘটল হোয়াইট ওয়াকারের। ১ অক্টোবর জনি ওয়াকার আনুষ্ঠানিকভাবে এই কথা ঘোষনা করে। ডিসেম্বরের শুরুতে এ্রর সীমিত-সংস্করণ ভারতে পাওয়া যাবে, যা হিট শো-হোয়াইট ওয়ার্কার্স-এর সবচেয়ে রহস্যময় এবং ভয়ঙ্কর চরিত্রগুলি দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত। এটি তৈরী করেছেন হুইস্কি বিশেষজ্ঞ জর্জ হার্পার এবং জননি ওয়াকারের বিশেষজ্ঞ একটি ছোট দল। জেফ পিটারস (ভাইস প্রেসিডেন্ট ,এইচ.বি.ও. লাইসেন্সিং ও রিটেল) বলেন, “আমরা জানতাম যে 'গেম অফ থ্রোনস’- এর হুইস্কির জন্য ফ্যানেরা তৃষ্ণার্ত ছিল এবং  জনি ওয়াকারের সহযোগিতায় আমরা পথ দেখতে পেয়ে দেখেছিলাম, আমরা জানতাম যে ধারণা এবং সময় নিখুঁত ছিল। আমাদের বিশ্বাস ভক্তরা এই সুস্বাদু হুইস্কির প্রতিটি চুমুক উপভোগ করবে যেমন করে তারা সিজন-৮ এবং তার পরবর্তী সিরিজ গুলির জন্য অপেক্ষা করছে।”

reblog.comment:
বাজারে আসতে চলেছে “গেম অফ থ্রোনস” দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত হোয়াইট ওয়াকার হুইস্কি

trail.content_raw:
বাজারে আসতে চলেছে “গেম অফ থ্রোনস” দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত হোয়াইট ওয়াকার হুইস্কি

বিখ্যাত টেলিভিশন সিরিজ “গেম অফ থ্রোনস” দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত হুইস্কি হোয়াইট ওয়াকার আপনার মাদকতায় কনিষ্ঠতম সংযোজন।  এইচবিও এবং “গেমস অফ থ্রোনস”-এর সহযোগিতায় আত্বপ্রকাশ ঘটল হোয়াইট ওয়াকারের। ১ অক্টোবর জনি ওয়াকার আনুষ্ঠানিকভাবে এই কথা ঘোষনা করে। ডিসেম্বরের শুরুতে এ্রর সীমিত-সংস্করণ ভারতে পাওয়া যাবে, যা হিট শো-হোয়াইট ওয়ার্কার্স-এর সবচেয়ে রহস্যময় এবং ভয়ঙ্কর চরিত্রগুলি দ্বারা অনুপ্রাণিত। এটি তৈরী করেছেন হুইস্কি বিশেষজ্ঞ জর্জ হার্পার এবং জননি ওয়াকারের বিশেষজ্ঞ একটি ছোট দল। জেফ পিটারস (ভাইস প্রেসিডেন্ট ,এইচ.বি.ও. লাইসেন্সিং ও রিটেল) বলেন, “আমরা জানতাম যে 'গেম অফ থ্রোনস’- এর হুইস্কির জন্য ফ্যানেরা তৃষ্ণার্ত ছিল এবং  জনি ওয়াকারের সহযোগিতায় আমরা পথ দেখতে পেয়ে দেখেছিলাম, আমরা জানতাম যে ধারণা এবং সময় নিখুঁত ছিল। আমাদের বিশ্বাস ভক্তরা এই সুস্বাদু হুইস্কির প্রতিটি চুমুক উপভোগ করবে যেমন করে তারা সিজন-৮ এবং তার পরবর্তী সিরিজ গুলির জন্য অপেক্ষা করছে।”

blog.name: quill-and-ink-alchemical-co
blog.title: Quill & Ink Alchemical Co.
blog.description: Hand-crafted, oil-based fragrances inspired by fictive universes & captivating stories, with a sprinkling of true historical inspiration.

tags: A Song of Ice and fire
summary: A Song of Ice and Fire inspired scents are here!
title: A Song of Ice and Fire inspired scents are here!
body:
I’ve just released 3 new scents inspired by the great houses of Westeros! Currently available are House Tyrell (a woodsy floral), House Lannister (a floral gourmand), and House Greyjoy (a damp aquatic). 


I’m in the process of formulating House Stark and House Targaryen, so rest assured that those will join the line-up soon.


If there are any Houses or characters you’d like to see represented please let me know! I’m a huge fan of suggestions - the suggestion of ASoIaF scents was actually given to me at SacAnime, so I do listen ;)
